category: news
title: "Fighting LGBTQ repression with recognition, Ohio style: Hans Johnson"
excerpt: "One antidote to bigotry are local rituals that express solidarity and respect for diversity. In late April, students, faculty, local residents, and a few past winners will gather on the campus of the College of Wooster to celebrate the 15th awarding of the John Plummer Scholarship for a More Welcoming Environment for LGBTQ People."
